structure.unit: Sec. 11-2208. - PARKING EXCEPTIONS AND SPACE RESERVATIONS AUTHORIZED BY CITY COUNCIL.

law.catch_line: PARKING EXCEPTIONS AND SPACE RESERVATIONS AUTHORIZED BY CITY COUNCIL.

text.section: The proposed use and necessity of reservation of spaces is of a temporary and not regularly occurring nature;
The proposed use and necessity of reservation of spaces is for a lawful purpose;
The reservation of spaces will not significantly impede pedestrian or vehicular traffic;
The proposed use will not endanger pedestrians, motorists, or occupants of adjacent buildings;
The purpose of which reservation of spaces is requested cannot be accomplished otherwise without risk of personal injury or property damage, or without excessive expense; and
The proposed use and reservation of spaces will not be injurious to the public peace, health, safety, and welfare. (Code 1959 , ยง21-48.1; Ord. No. 1983-83, ยง1, 3-15-83)
